sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Governor Succession Act.

sections.heading: (a) In the event that the Governor, for any of the reasons
sections.text:
specified in Article V, Section 6 of the Constitution of the State of Illinois,
is not able to exercise the powers and discharge the duties of his office,
such powers and duties of the office shall be exercised by the officer next
in line of succession, in the order named as follows:
